meanings.sent1: The teacher asked the students to stop their crapolas during class.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of frustration or disappointment
meanings.sent1: Crapolas! I forgot my keys inside the house again.
meanings.sent2: When he saw the flat tire, he exclaimed, 'Crapolas!'
